issue.title: builder-keys: unable to find A2FD494D0021AA9B4FA58F759102B7AE654A4A5A
issue.body:
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/38d06e1561013f4ca845fd5ba6ffcc64de67f9c0/contrib/builder-keys/keys.txt#L25

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/2b4cfb44bd75d6e51eb9e7ca692b2fa32250ad04#diff-0538084c53da5acd80bd796d75b10246d7346231643b3f4b1e136204bc829f56R21

Please post which key server this is available on.

cc: @IlyasRidhuan

events.body:
synced all other keys with

hkp://keys.openpgp.org,
hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com,
hkp://pgp.mit.edu

to ensure redundancy:

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RandyMcMillan/bitcoin/2e7e4ec93b85c54e55fc0cf053bb57c8da079d08/builder-key-sync.log
I think we can remove all keys that were used for gitian builds only and never for a guix build
additionally - we can setup a ci script that detects when this file changes (PR) and checks that the keys are on public key servers?
I think it only changes rarely, and if it changes, people will check that the key is available. See also https://github.com/bitcoin-core/guix.sigs/issues/133

> I think we can remove all keys that were used for gitian builds only and never for a guix build

I will cross reference the https://github.com/bitcoin-core/guix.sigs repo - and list any unused keys from the contrib/builder-keys/keys.txt in this PR for discussion and/or removal.

ACK dddfa028ffa6b6d70e4fae761ecb9477877d8ec2

> I think we can remove all keys that were used for gitian builds only and never for a guix build

I'll follow up with this.

issue.title: contrib: remove builder keys
issue.body:
This has been superseded by adding a builder-keys/ directory in
guix.sigs, where the presence of keys, and validity of signatures
is checked. Preventing issues like missing keys or invalid signatures.

New (or exisiting) Guix builders can add their key in the next PR
they open adding attestations.

Related to issues like #26566, #26563.

Also follows up with the comment here: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26565#issuecomment-1326053939.
